item.title: 【Helpdesk】NTSC/PAL Question
item.description: Hi, i have an american cartoon in a pretty good quality and i also have lots of foreign countrys dubs that i would love to add. Most of the audios are in PAL since they're european, but their original video track is horrible quality, i would like to 'convert' those NTSC video to PAL so the audio can fit and it will have a better video track, any way i can do this? in the most 'lossless' way
item.author: limat
